Reviews.Title: “GREAT PLACE TO STAY”
Reviews.Author: Robin B
Reviews.Content: We rented a one room villa about three months prior to our visit. We got a great deal on the room rate and the Villa was a little over 900 square feet. Felt like an apartment rather than a hotal. Great staff and room was very clean. I would highly recommend this resort!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay and not too far away!”
Reviews.Author: Conrads_Travels
Reviews.Content: This was an unexpectantly pleasant stay! We stayed in one of the one bedroom villas. Was decorated very nicely and extremely clean with a small kitchenette. The resort feels very far from Branson but is actually a stone's throw away from the strip; you would never know it as there is little to no road noise. The pool is great, just be sure and bring your coolers. Also ate at the little pizza place on site and it is very good. Proximity to all of Branson dining is very close. We did do the timeshare presentation and it was fine but I probably wouldn't do it again, however, it did earn us an extra $100. Overall, very pleasant little stay - would love to go again!

Reviews.Title: “One of the best Westgate Resorts”
Reviews.Author: Joe S
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were very pleased with our stay at this resort. The one bedroom deluxe was well maintained and roomy. We enjoyed the activities and food the community and nearby town offered. We will recommend this resort to others and would like to return someday.

Reviews.Title: “FIRST RESORT VISITED OUTSIDE THE ONE WE OWN IN GATLINBURG”
Reviews.Author: msjackied2
Reviews.Content: This resort was very nice and is located in an area that makes it easy to go to all the activities in downtown Branson or just relax at the resort in peace and quiet. There are activities for kids and adults, although we didn't perticipate in any. We checked on them, because we will return in March with my grandkids.

Reviews.Title: “I Wish I Would Have Known Some Things...”
Reviews.Author: citygalSTL
Reviews.Content: This was a family reunion, of sorts, with my sister planning the trip and booking all of the rooms. Because of that, I bothered to do no research. That was a mistake on my part. I'm sure that many of my findings were stated somewhere on Westgate's (or TripAdvisor's) website, but I didn't bother to look. Here are some things that might be helpful for guests. The activities cost. I was under the assumption that the tie-dyeing tee-shirts and making bird houses were included in the cost. Bring laundry detergent. My room only had one small packet and that's not enough when you have several people in a room staying a week. Bring your own dish-washing detergent. Yep, there was only enough in our room for one load and our pots/pans were not non-stick. There's no free WiFi. I was extremely disappointed to learn internet service was $10 a day AND that only one person could be on one device in the room at the same time. There's no recycling....at least none that I saw. Who doesn't recycle in this day and age?! Given all these things I wish I would have known ahead of time, I was extremely impressed with the place. The fact that there is a washer/dryer in the room was awesome! It was extremely clean and well-kept. I thought the location was good, too. My family is planning on going back next year and that says volumes about this place because lots of my family members are extremely picky. I look forward to returning next year--I'll just bring a few things from home and leave the laptop there, too.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: Ashley41903
Reviews.Content: We are timeshare owners with westgate in gaitlinburg. The one in gaitlinburg is much nicer with more amenities and an indoor waterpark but our stay here was nice.the rooms were nice and there were lots of activities for our son to do. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “might stay again”
Reviews.Author: rjguess
Reviews.Content: rented a 1bedroom deluxe villa. staff was friendly ,check in was easy. during check in they tried to talk to us about doing a time share tour, about 5 minutes worth of telling him no, we were on our way. the villa appeared clean n neat as we walked in. It was very roomy! As the time passed we did notice the place was in desperate need of spring cleaning! dust, dust and lots of dust! and in dont mean thin layers of dust i mean months of dust build up on curtains,blinds and ceiling. the biggest issue i had was the hot water runs out really fast! i dont take long showers maybe 10min. at the longest, and i ran out of hot water. tried to fill bathtub 2nd night there and that was a joke! also like many places they still have dinosaur tvs. and you have to pay a ridiculous amount for wifi. On a good note the bed was very comfortable and so were the couches. all appliances worked, place smelt good. other than the dust and the lousy hot water the stay was pretty good. they have pizza delivery on site and i really liked the pizza. a large was about $11. and delivery was fast!

Reviews.Title: “Working vacation”
Reviews.Author: MichaelW122
Reviews.Content: Spent some time over the weekend at Westgate Branson Woods, took the kids to SDC and spent the rest of the time in the pools. Kids actually, would rather stay at the resort than go to the park next time. The morning breakfast is hot and complete and the staff is very friendly and anxious to assist.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Lake Saint Louis, Missouri, United States
Reviews.Title: “Great place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: MartyUnt
Reviews.Content: My wife and I, our children and all our grandchildren really love this place. It is in a senic setting, is beautifully developed, well maintained, and has an excellent, friendly staff, with reasonable rates. This was our second vacation at this resort and we are all eager to return.

Reviews.Title: “As Good As Everybody Said”
Reviews.Author: Jackie B
Reviews.Content: I read reviews of many resorts in Branson and everyone said Westgate was a great location just off the main strip, clean, with lots to do. It was all true. The location was so perfect - off the beaten path and yet close to everything. The grounds are really beautiful and the rooms are very clean, with the exception of the carpet in our suite which does need to be replaced. We did have trouble with the hot water heater, but they really worked hard to get it fixed and would respond very quickly when we called. My kids loved it and were very sad to leave. They loved hanging out at the activity center and the indoor and outdoor pools. The adults really appreciated the spacious two bedroom we stayed in. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL STAY”
Reviews.Author: Annette C
Reviews.Content: I take my staff on a trip every year, this year we went to Branson. We stayed at Westgate and had a fabulous experience. The Villa was outstanding, well stocked, clean, fresh, had every luxary, and there was plenty of room. The balcony was such a relaxing morning spot, we watched the squirrels play and just enjoyed a cup of coffee. I strongly reccomend the lower villas they are just the thing for a relaxing time.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location service was great.”
Reviews.Author: Coco57Noah
Reviews.Content: We stayed during the July 4 2010 weekend..They had their annual parade and car show. Lots of fun. THIS resort has plenty of activies for children and adults on Tuesdays they have about 12 entertainment groups come by and perform for about 15 minutes each and give you a sample of what you will see at their shows.They also have a barbeque which you pay for that evening about $7.00. Lots of activies and fun for all. You do need a car to get around. Traveler room tips: get 3Rd floor and away from elevators in main building.

Reviews.Title: “More than expected!!!”
Reviews.Author: CardinalFan41
Reviews.Content: Family of 5 mini vacation. We were a little nervous about this place based on some of the reviews, but was wonderfully suprised! We stayed 3 nights and enjoyed every minute of our stay! Our room (one bedroom grand villa) was beautiful, had everything that you would possible need. Speedy check in. All the staff was very friendly and helpful. We called down for extra towels and blanket, and they were delivered within 20 min. Great pool area. Great location. We will be staying here again!

Reviews.Title: “Sigh - we keep expecting more from this place but...”
Reviews.Author: Michael F
Reviews.Content: After a 7 hour drive, it was really unacceptable that we had to sit, after a reasonably quick check in, to await a concierge who would give us a "welcome packet". We waited awhile but really needed to get settled, so we proceeded without concierge, thinking that we'd have had a visit within hours with our "welcome packet". This didn't happen until two days later, at 9 am, while we were still sleeping in. He promised to return that evening. We stayed and left without our "welcome packet" (which does contain one or two items of value). The closet and rear patio could have been vacuumed, and the a/c could respond better to instructions. These properties look NOTHING like they did when we purchased our week - with one or two exceptions, they are generally FAR from the luxury we are promised. This two-floor "grand" villa (1 br) required a trek upstairs for any toilet use or any look in a mirror. The general cleaning promised mid-week was an exercise of sloppiness. The bed was made, the trash thrown out, but we had to call housekeeping back to clean the vanity and whirlpool and vacuum the floors. The two who came did the latter and refused the other tasks because "that was not their job"! A little talk with a supervisor who visited rectified that nonsense the following day. Even when cleaned, the dullness of the whirlpool was no invitation to us to place our behinds in there. Indeed, this was not cleaned to the best quality even BEFORE we arrived; what I had thought was simply ageing grout turned out to be, for a 7" section at the top of the tub, dirt - mold that i could easily remove with toilet tissue. Shame! This was rendered a little better after the midweek cleaning. The bed might have been a bit more comfortable (softer) but at least the pillows were clean, and not a repeat of a previous stay at one of their other locations when we had a pillow that reeked of somebody's urine. I found the exercise room to be shabby; I found it ridiculous that in this age, in what is touted as a luxury hotel, the TVs in the room are old tubes, and neither of them was even 32". You would think that people do not pay maintenance fees and taxes on these properties! Shame!!! The transmission and picture on the one premium channel (HBO) was horrible on both TVs. This chain has been really too disappointing over the 10 years I have been "imprisoned" to visit.

Reviews.Title: “family enjoyed the amenities”
Reviews.Author: fanoflizzy
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights in one of the smaller motel like units and had a great stay. Our first room did not smell like a non-smoking room, and they quickly gave us a new room close by. The rooms were small but pretty clean. We loved that our dog was welcome on property, though we thought the price ($80) was a bit high. The grounds were beautiful. Kids loved the outdoor pool with the waterfalls, the shuffleboard and the basketball hoop. We did not try the breakfast buffet, but we did have the pizza delivered to our room. It was ok but pricey. Maid service did not come to our room the first day and we had to call for them to come the 2nd day, but they did a good job when they came. The location was very convenient....close to all but very easy to avoid the busy main road. We found it a good value and might return to try the cabins another time.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value ....”
Reviews.Author: colinklee
Reviews.Content: Be prepared for the timeshare hard-sell - otherwise great value, clean resort, good pool facilities and friendly staff. Great location, close to main Branson attractions, but easy to avoid the main drag as well. Main complaints were the very poor Fitness Center, expensive (but good quality) pizza take-away, and poor quality (but cheap) breakfast buffet. Only an issue if you expect to use them, otherwise we had a great time (and so did our pet dog, Toby :) !!

Reviews.Title: “Soooo much more than a hotel”
Reviews.Author: WindstarTravelGirl
Reviews.Content: Immediately surprised once I toured this property. There are 2 outdoor pools and 1 indoor pool, an onsite Pizzaria, Excercise Room, meeting rooms that can hold up to 450 guests, Activities Center where they do things throughout the day for all ages and a Massage Therapist to recover from the Outlet Store Shopping and so much more. The nature Trail and waterfall is just perfect for the adventurous or the romantic. Now for the rooms. Yes, they have the typical hotel room type rooms, which is really great for groups or for the cost conscious traveler, but they also have Villas that overlook beautiful wooded property and cabins if you want to pretend you're ruffing it. There are 1 and 2 bedrooms and even rooms that open up enough to hold up to 10 people. I fell in love with the 2 bedroom deluxe. One of the bedrooms is upstairs and one downstairs and such a large living/dining area and full kitchen. Some of the cabins and nicer rooms do tend to fill up fast so plan ahead. The service here is what you come to expect in Branson. Everyone is so willing to please and to serve. Just love the Ozarks. The only negative that I noticed was the exterior walkways by the hotel rooms could be a little more clean. Some spider webs, dirt and could use a sweep. Just have to remember that it's outside in the woods and you can tolerate a little of that. The location is perfect. It's off on it's own and you really feel the privacy however, just down the street from the Hwy 76 Strip and all the shopping and real close to Silver Dollar City too.

Reviews.Title: “So, So....”
Reviews.Author: stl17
Reviews.Content: Stayed for a week during softball world series so we were in and out all week. Overall location is great to stay away from strip. Can take backways to SDC or downtown. Rooms were good....clean... pool nice, used almost nightly. Called 3 days in for bedding, towels and TP. Received towels and TP after 2nd request and 24 hours after first. Had already washed our own load of towels by then. Bedding was never changed. Ordered pizza 1 night. Told 40 minutes and waited 1hr 10min for delivery. Paid $25 for 3 days of WIFI. Had maybe 10 minutes of connection over 3 days. Asked for full refund for WIFI at checkout and received it w/o questions. Could have free WIFI at McDonalds all week!!?? Would stay again for location alone....worth it to stay away from strip!! They need to provide better instructions for using washer/dryer combo. Coudn't get the door to unlock 1/2 the time after drying cycle....had to look up instructions on-line with part of my 10 minutes of connection!!

Reviews.Title: “Rude Resort Branding Woods”
Reviews.Author: mrof
Reviews.Content: As owners we went for a week in a Studio Unit, They Never came to clean the room. We had to beg for clean sheets and they brought the wrong size when they finally arrived. No vacuum cleaner in the room and after asking several times, they vacuumed once. Needless to say 3 towels for the week is ridiculous!! We were constantly begging for towels/ wash clothes. Not to mention the liason between the resort and us demanded we take another sales tour " to upgrade" after we told her we were not interested She banged on our door at 8:30am to intimidate and harrass us. I went to complain to management and all they did was apologize and promise to change the sheets personally ( they never did but sent the wrong size sheets to our room instead.) Would not recommend anyone to buy into Westgate Resorts !!!

Reviews.Title: “JULY 25 2012 SUMMER VACATION”
Reviews.Author: sherry w
Reviews.Content: My husband and I and our 15 teen year old twin girls stayed at the hotel part at west gate. The room was big enough for the four of us and very clean and quiet. We used the picnic area for lunch.The pool is very nice, we did'nt swim because it was a very hot day and because there were a lot of people swimming. There wasn't much room to get in so we passed on swimming. Overall, the hotel is very clean and quiet and would definitely stay there again.Thank you for a wonderful time.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay, attentive staff”
Reviews.Author: Mistykmc
Reviews.Content: We stayed 7 night in the villas and could not have ask for a better stay. From the moment you go through the security gate, you are made to feel welcome. Our room was great for our family of 4 and we love our balcony view. We had to call housekeeping a couple of times while we where there (lightbulbs where out in living area and a leaky sink in the kitchen). There staff was out within 15 minutes to fix the issues. We couldn't have been more pleased with the service! It's just a beautiful resort and close to everything!

Reviews.Title: “What an awesome experience!”
Reviews.Author: CONSTANCE T
Reviews.Content: We hosted our family reunion at the Westgate Branson Woods Resort in July. The Westgate Resorts had everything we wanted to do and everything we needed. The rooms are outstanding. The staff is superb. The location is outstanding. It is a must see, must visit, and must enjoy! All the children had a good time and loved all the activities that were availabel to them. The food at the various locations were great. The Westagte Resorts have all the accommodations for each age group (kids, teen, young adults, adults ans senors).

Reviews.Title: “Best Place in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: TravelLoverMarch2011
Reviews.Content: The property is beautiful...quiet and peaceful. The waterfall in the middle of the pool was really cool too! It's off the strip so it's not in the middle of all the freaking traffic. Room was a bit on the small side but was definitely worth the price. I'd definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “What a fun place for a short family vacation”
Reviews.Author: GoMacsGo
Reviews.Content: We have 16 people in our family (including grandkids) so we rented two of the 2-bedroom villas for a 3-day weekend getaway. I love the way the villas are arranged so there were basically not only two bedrooms/bathrooms, but also two living rooms, stoves, refrigerators, and washer/dryers in each "villa". Building 1000 (the main building) is the best. Everything was very clean and updated. Also, the pool area is great and it was right across from Building 1000. A few complaints that kept me from rating this property excellent: WiFi costs $9.99 per day PER DEVICE. Terrible arrangement -- every podunk motel anywhere else offers free WiFi. Can you do without WiFi? Of course, but evening Netflicks on iPads for the kiddos and if you own a business and need to stay in touch in the evenings can get pricey. Also, the check in/check out times are very inconvenient (4 pm check in and 10 am check out). Really cuts into your weekend when you can't check in until 4pm on Friday and have to be out by 10am on Sunday. One last issue: We would have loved to have the villas next to each other but even with advance calls and requests, they still could not make this happen. So there you have it, the good, the bad and the ugly. Much more good which made this a fun place for our family.

Reviews.Title: “Nice resort”
Reviews.Author: sunshine991
Reviews.Content: Beautiful property, great location near west end of strip. Staff very friendly and helpful. Activity staff made trip very fun and many activities for kids. Pizza reasonably priced and excellent taste. Pools were crystal clean a big improvement from the past. Internet service unreliable and slow would be our only complaint. We will stay there again when in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Bring Your Own Sheets”
Reviews.Author: Ken F
Reviews.Content: Property, very nice. Room, not so much. Nothing updated over the last 8-10 years. Cheap fixtures/shower. Residential grade hot tubs at pool area were broke. ***SHEETS STAINED WITH BODY OIL*** HAIR ENTANGLED IN SHEETS. IF YOU STAY HERE, BRING YOUR OWN SHEETS. I was extremely disappointed in management. Manager Sherry got a call around midnight with a customer complaint, and never checked in on us. The Night time security guard brought us our 4th set of sheets,,,FINALLY, clean sheets. But by then, we already went to the store to buy our own sheets. I am a Westgate timeshare owner, and can tell you that the resort in Florida and Virginia that I have stayed in were Very clean, but not this one. Rooms OK, Property GOOD, location GREAT, Hot Tub POOR, Pool GREAT, Porch OK-had rips in screen, DIRTY sheets. Unacceptable response to complaint. FIND A BETTER RESORT!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Book with Vacations Made Easy or Branson Shows.com!”
Reviews.Author: Nancy F
Reviews.Content: We had a horrible time with this agency - double booked our room..couldnt change or reservation... management wouldnt help us at all! The Resort itself is nice - huge ... out off of the main drag but no retaurants or bars or stores on the site so have to drive everhywhere...room was ok - nice pool... again dont book with this agency!!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Resort”
Reviews.Author: Jeanie A
Reviews.Content: Our family of 4 really enjoyed our stay at Branson Woods. The grounds and buildings were lovely and in excellent condition. The staff was friendly and responsive. We will probably stay there again next time we visit Branson.

Reviews.Title: “I like the cabin/condos much more than the hotel”
Reviews.Author: TIMBOBfromKC
Reviews.Content: but it all is really great and close to town without being on the strip

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Resort!”
Reviews.Author: Doris P
Reviews.Content: This was a wonderful getaway from all of the city life! I hated to leave. Because I'm a single mom, I loved the security. Branson is a wonderful place for family! Thank you, Branson Woods Resort!

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Stay!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Diane T
Reviews.Content: We had the One Bedroom Villa Deluxe! It was beautiful, very comfortable and accomadating! Gorgeous wooded view near hiking trails. Easy to town, shops, shows ect..., supurb amenities. There was 3 adults, myself, my Hubby and my elderly Father. I loved having coffee on the balcony early morning and watching the wildlife in the woods! I wood love to return to Westgate soon!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful grounds, but rooms need to be cleaned better!”
Reviews.Author: Mrsmom_12
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this resort in a one bedroom villa. Theses villas are tiny!! Almost claustrophobic. Only one window in entire unit. They are decorated cute but are in need of a good cleaning. My kids socks were black just from walking around room. The faucet kept shifting whenever we turned it on and the toilet didn't flush well. The room wasn't very soundproof. We could hear people outside the door and in the adjoining room. We did like that the room had a small kitchenette and washer/dryer. Pay attention when you book the one bedroom , it only has a mini fridge compared to the full size in the two bedroom. The grounds are beautiful and the pools were a blast for all of us. We were asked to participate in a 90 min tour of the property for a cash payment which was annoying and which we promptly turned down. Overall, I'd give this resort a 7 out of 10. A high number because of how pretty the grounds are. I would not stay here again though.

Reviews.Title: “branson west gate resorts”
Reviews.Author: nell56
Reviews.Content: great place to stay nice people clean room every thing you need with just a call to front desk would love to stay here for my yearly trip to branson

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to relax”
Reviews.Author: lbustos321
Reviews.Content: Westgate Branson Woods is a great place to stay. Calm, relaxing and fun all at the same time. Great family vacation! Look forward to coming back again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Christy P
Reviews.Content: The check in staff is awesome. The night crew could have been a little nicer at times but, overall the staff is great. Clean, cool rooms at Garden Inn. The pool is the right size for my family and the kids loved it. A little too much chlorine but it was still nice! We will definitely stay here again....but would recommend a room facing the pool rather than on the back side!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place!!”
Reviews.Author: Christina S
Reviews.Content: I will definately be visiting Westgate Branson Woods again!! Not only were the grounds beautiful, but the location was amazing! The security staff were more than helpful, and very honest, trustworthy people. Ecspecially when I left my driver's license and debit card in my room after checkout. I called, and she went right up to my room, and found them where I told her they would be, called me from her personal cell phone to let me know she had them in her possesion, and they would be waiting for me when I returned. Westgate was awesome!

Reviews.Title: “family reunion”
Reviews.Author: Valerie M
Reviews.Content: This was an ideal place for a family get-together. We had activities to please all generations. The meeting room was cheerful and adequate, with a kitchen and bathrooms. We enjoyed having this private place to visit and reminesce whenever there was free time. Crafts and socials were geared to older and younger family members making our four days very enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Branson Woods”
Reviews.Author: LB_8710
Reviews.Content: We liked the resort and thought it was a pretty good price. My husband and I stayed in a one bedroom condo. It had a full kitchen, balcony, and jacuzzi. The room was generally clean and comfortable. The staff was helpful, and the Internet use was free. Our main dislikes were stains on the carpet and thin walls. The baby next door cried often, and the kids in the unit above us sounded like they practiced bowling in their unit. We stayed as visiting owners.

Reviews.Title: “Secure beautiful place for single ladies”
Reviews.Author: Dolores B
Reviews.Content: This was supposed to be a "friends holiday" but due to a family crisis, it ended up a "solo holiday" instead. The security, helpfulness and friendliness of everyone made it a refreshing experience after all. The shows around Branson are scheduled at various times, so you can always find entertainment, shopping, dining, etc. besides all the things to do at the resort. I wanted to walk some of the trails but just didn't have time for everything. I didn't use room service but the menu looked inviting. People are friendly while vacationing in Branson. I met a nice family from Ontario,Canada at the mystery dinner theater.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay away from the Strip”
Reviews.Author: CowgirlCoeds
Reviews.Content: Although Hotels.com had the description of our rental incorrect, the management came through and supplied what we were asking for. The description for the one bedroom villa stated that there was a deck, when in fact that's not the case! If you desire to use the pool make sure and indicate that you prefer something nearby, as it's quite a hike to get there if you don't! We didn't use it but saw a lot of "red-faced" people huffing their way both there and back. The terrain is quite steep, but good if you want a work out. We got a west facing balcony which made it nice to siit out and have coffee in the morning w/out being blinded by the sun.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed”
Reviews.Author: Marian T
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Westgate Branson Resort was the best. Everyone and everything was just great. The employees and staff were friendly. The cabin was perfect. I would recommend staying at the Westgate Branson Resort to anyone who loves visiting Branson. The location is convenient to all the shows and restaurants. We're planning on bringing a group next time for the Thanksgiving holidays, it would be a lovely time to stay at Westgate Branson Resorts.

Reviews.Title: “No Better Place to Stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: James K
Reviews.Content: Our family has stayed here twice now and my only regret is that we didn't find this place sooner on all our trips to Branson. The two bedroom Villa is great - has everything you need. The pools are great, walking trail was nice, location is perfect (away from busy streets and behind a gate). The interior furnishings in the villas are slightly dated, but it's hard to find anything wrong to say about this place based on our two trips.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Mark D
Reviews.Content: We (2 adults and 2 children) stayed in a small, 1 bedroom condo unit at Westgate. We didn't spend a lot of time in the unit so it was a perfect size. There was only a shower and no tub. If you need a tub for smaller children then keep that in mind. Beds and pillows where very comfortable. The room was rather new looking and clean. However there were a couple large dead moths and I had to take care of a wasp that made its way in. The pool is nice though we had to drive to get to it. It was very easy to keep track of the kids in the childrens section of the pool. It was difficult to get a chair at peak times. A good time to go is dinner time, the pool almost clears out. We gave sand volleyball and shuffleboard a try, both where a lot of fun. The basketballs at our court have endured some serious weather. So if you want a real game go ask for another ball or bring your own. There is also a walking trail throught he woods, though we didn't get a chance to try it. Westgates proximity to the strip and shopping is perfect. We'll definitely be staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “1st time, but NOT our last!!”
Reviews.Author: Baseball_Mom630
Reviews.Content: Our team booked a block of rooms and WHAT A SURPRISE!!! Our family was very happy with WBW -- lots of activities for each age, wonderful pool area and very friendly staff!! I LOVED having a laundry facility in our building!! The security/locked gate made us feel like no one was on the grounds that shouldn't be which gave us a sense of security. Loved staying in Missouri and enjoying all that nature offers. THANK YOU for a great stay...our family WILL return!

Reviews.Title: “We love this place!”
Reviews.Author: spch84
Reviews.Content: We go back to this place annually as we are able (last year we couldn't as no vacation time with new job). We love being off the beaten path, away from the noise, but still close to town. They have security/locked gate, so nobody is there who isn't supposed to be there. That makes us feel safer. The rooms have been clean, we love having the kitchen facilities in the condo to use, and feel very at home.

Reviews.Title: “Severe Buyer Remorse, WE LEFT EARLY!”
Reviews.Author: Beatle H
Reviews.Content: Months in advance, I paid for a unit that slept 8 people. They booked me in a basement that slept 6people. I brought 7 people. No vacancy nearby due to Memorial Day weekend. When I called the front desk to remove the live lizard from our unit, they didn't seem to care. There were piles of dead and live bugs in every room including wasps and roaches. The wasps nest was located under the stairs you were supposed to use. Did I mention the human feces in the large outdoor pool? They don't clean the smaller outdoor pool probably becase no one poos in it. Wifi was not free! The ceiling fan over the bed nearly fell on the maintenance man and almost killed him. An employee confessed, "We know these units are bad and we don't maintain them very well because they are from some partnership deal. " "We would never book our owners in these units we just book interval members and other condo exchange customers." Then they said, "When you think about it, its only fair right?" I tried to upload pictures of the lizard in our room below but it buffers forever.

Reviews.Title: “Try It - Enjoy the experience”
Reviews.Author: Jim51667
Reviews.Content: My husband and I extended our Memorial Day vacation to include six nights in Branson. We used an exchange stay through Interval Int'l for an efficiency room with refrigerator and microwave. The accomodations were very clean and comfortable and entirely met our needs. All contact with the Resort Personnel was very professional and friendly. We enjoyed the Tuesday evening "all you can eat" with various Branson entertainers performing. The hosts did a very good job keeping everything moving and entertaining. Resort appeared to be well-maintained and managed. Thanks for a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Bait & Switch”
Reviews.Author: B G
Reviews.Content: My wife and I decided to take a trip to Branson for Memorial weekend and ended up picking a cabin that was supposed to have a hot tub at Westgate for our stay. We checked in Saturday afternoon, got our key cards and headed for our cabin. The first thing we noticed upon arrival to our cabin was that it was NOT a cabin. It was a small Hotel room/kitchenette. Also, there was no hot tub! We went back up to the office to point out their mistake and the desk clerk informed us that it was not a mistake. We booked a cabin with a hot tub and we showed them our printout again from booking our cabin online. We asked to speak with the manager about this because our printout clearly showed we booked a cabin with a hot tub, not a small hotel room on the 4th floor. The Manager told us that the amount we paid online at their site was not enough to rent a cabin for the weekend because we didn't pay the "Cabin Price". We then decided we wanted a refund to which we were told "You can go someplace else if you like but there will be NO REFUND". They offered us a larger room on the 1st floor (still with no hot tub) but that was the best they would do, "Take it or leave it". So if there is someone out there thinking about staying at Westgate Branson Woods and think you are getting a cabin with a hot tub then I suggest you think again because it doesn't matter what your paperwork says and there will be NO REFUND! Also, if you like having clean towels I sugest you bring your own.

Reviews.Title: “Needs a Lot Of cleaning”
Reviews.Author: weathernerd
Reviews.Content: First off this is a very nice hotel great staff great service but it needs some repairs I stayed in a 2 bedroom villa for 2 nights and when we were packing to leave the power was cut off there were no storms it high winds in the area but I guess it might be a way of letting you know when it's time to leave this villa (21) is in need of a very DEEP cleaning I saw what I'm Pretty is is mouse droppings along the back wall in the room where I stayed the dishes were Filthy (we had to wash them before we used them) the beds were in need of new mattresses and the sliding doors on the closet need to be replaced also I would suggest getting newer tvs and put a Dvd player in each room with a tv over all this place was awesome but breakfast in a old hotel room Tacky! Not to mention the stuff that was supposed to ba warm was cold the "grape juice" was actually grape koolaid -Tacky! To improved These things I would suggest moving the breakfast buffett to the main building or the club house getting Real grape juice not koolaid sending a professional cleaning crew in making sure the dishes are clean and replacing the doors on the closet and having hot food instead of cold food overall it needs help but it is still an amazing resort

Reviews.Title: “First timers”
Reviews.Author: Carol M
Reviews.Content: We are or rather were owners in Orlando, but after our stay we decided Branson would suit us better. This was the best vacation. All of the staff were great and very efficient. We need toilet tissue, I made the call and 5 minutes later there was a knock on our door. That;s what I call service. We went to some of the activities especially the dinner show and breakfast. They were the best. The grounds were very well kept and everything was nice and clean. I am proud to be a Branson owner now and can't wait to get back there.

Reviews.Title: “Things have greatly improved since our last visit”
Reviews.Author: lucypuppat
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a cabin this time. It was very quiet, restful, private and peaceful. The activities at the resort have improved. The customer service has greatly improved. This is the best stay we have had at a Westgate Resort in at least thirteen years. We wish the other Westgate resorts were this nice.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful but lack of communication in staff”
Reviews.Author: marilyn_1388
Reviews.Content: The property is amazing with a volleyball cout, basketball court, indoor and outdoor pool, and many activities to do on the property. I had a 2 bedroom condo with a jacuzzi, full kitchen, dining room, etc. for this money I paid I wish tnhere wasn't a lack of communication with housekeeping. I called to get my room cleaned in the morning while I was out in the town for the day and when I got back in the late evening my room was not cleaned, the garbage was still there, and there were no fresh towels for us. I had to call and complain the next day to be told there was miscommunication with houskeeping. It could get noisy with landscaping machinery so don't plan on sleeping in. I did love the room, amenities, and property.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!!”
Reviews.Author: denisek32
Reviews.Content: I met 6 of my high school friends there for a 3 night stay. We had the 4 bedroom cabin and it was FANTASTIC!! We loved having privacy plus 4 bathrooms for 7 women was great! We loved the indoor pool and the location. After checking out the kitchen, we realized we didn't have a blender. I called the staff and within 15 minutes the blender was delivered to us. The entire staff was friendly and helpful in every way possible. I lived in Branson several years ago and return often. This is someplace I will always consider staying. I would recommend the cabins to everyone! Perfect for families !

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great service.”
Reviews.Author: TripDoc46
Reviews.Content: First can I say the INDOOR pool rocks in April!!! The service was great from the staff, some reviewers argue that is it overpriced. I would say it is not a cheap, bug infested hotel with food already rolled into the price. (There is no such thing as free food) If you want a cheap, dirty, hotel in a bad location don't come here. If you want a nice hotel in a great location, mere blocks to outlet malls, with great facilities, lots to do nice staff. Then this is the place for you. It is a beautiful property, and a very nice tranquil place to stay with great service. It is not a cheap discounted, hole in the wall. Where the room will make you miserable but they offer average food to compensate for your long drive and bug bitten body. It is just a nice place to stay, worth the price without a doubt.

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced”
Reviews.Author: obitwriter
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the main building - 4th floor. We had a one bedroom unit with kitchen, living area with fireplace and bathroom. Wi-fi was not free - there was a $10. charge which we did not pay. Breakfast was not free - it was $5.50 per person and the selections were minimal. I've had much more at hotels that provide free breakfast. We paid $150. per night for our unit, which was way overpriced. We could have gone elsewhere and received larger and better accomodations. The grounds were well kept and the employees were all friendly. If we ever stay here again we will ask for a cabin.

Reviews.Title: “Prepare to pay”
Reviews.Author: Yourguide32
Reviews.Content: I really thought this place would look like the photos on the website... But nope! Just your average motel room. I can't speak for the cabins, but the room we had looked nothing like the photos. Average bed, average shower, average room. What got me so upset was paying for all the things usually provided free. Breakfast (true not always free) and wifi!?! Yup, you have to pay $10 extra PER DAY for wifi. That is unacceptable to me and I will not even give the cabins a chance because of it.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice timeshare in Branson....”
Reviews.Author: alceatoo
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a 2 bedroom villa...Travel Tip- ask for Building 43, second floor. It has by far the best view, sunniest balcony, overlooking the pond, bridge and wild ducks that live there. The villa is spacious! Plenty of room for a family or two couples plus some kids. Large, separate dining area, large separate living space, spacious kitchen/cooking area. The grounds at Branson Woods are well kept, the pool area was clean and neat, and the service was friendly and timely at every turn. We visited in early April which is clearly a slow time in their season, and made for a quiet, relaxing time at the resort. And I agree with others that the linens and beds were nice and cozy! But don't spend too much time sleeping, there's plenty of activities at the resort and in town that you won't want to miss!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it !”
Reviews.Author: ReneN3365
Reviews.Content: We just got back from Branson on 4/9/12. we stayed at Westgate Branson Woods . The Villa was so nice and the place was so peaceful. The staff was excellent. Pizza place on site was the best pizza I have ever had. We took my mother along with us and she took the adjoining room and she loved it. She was able to close off our side when she wanted peace and quit or open and join us when she wanted. It only took a few mins to leave the resort and to arrive at many of the attractions and shows and shopping and restaurants. I love Westgate we our owners in Orlando. I was really surprise at the the size of Villa's...was like a house and it was hard to believe their was another unit below us. Great place to take the Family.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, nice facility!”
Reviews.Author: PickyMomMid_MO
Reviews.Content: Had a 1 bedroom villa deluxe. It was very clean and well decorated. Loved the tile bathroom and walk in shower! Linens were soft. Decor was attractive and pleasant. Was outdated or overused. Our patio overlooked a wooded hillside - very lovely to sit and enjoy the quiet! The grounds were very well kept. Indoor pool was crowded but clean. Kids, ages 8 & 9 loved the trail, playing in the creek, shuffleboard, basketball - even played on the playground which they rarely do anymore. Been to several time share facilities in Branson. This is one of the nicer facilities!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Nice”
Reviews.Author: blondiechic900
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a church retreat at this resort. The room had a jacuzzi tub the size of a hot tub and a walk in shower, full kitchen and nice furnishings.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Property But Outdated”
Reviews.Author: ostate1
Reviews.Content: Gorgeous, gated property. The staff was excellent (all of the staff at the gate was super friendly!). We stayed in the cabins. The first night we had no hot water. We called the next morning and they were there within 10 minutes to fix it. We also requested extra towels mid-week and again, there in 10 minutes. It was as clean as it could be. I had a major problem with the dark green carpet. So many gross stains!! I'm sure it hasn't been cleaned in awhile...Yuck! I hated having the kids in there b/c they were all over the carpet. Nice to have a fireplace if it really put off heat. It's just for looks and makes a crackling noise. Loved the screened in porch. Had breakfast out there in the mornings. There is a fee for wifi...but for some reason it was free for us! We were there with our timeshare and had traded a week for this property. Again, it's a beautiful, quiet property away from (but close to) the strip. Easy access to all the back roads. I honestly would have given it 5 stars if it was updated and clean.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value and vacation”
Reviews.Author: ConnieH1
Reviews.Content: We booked our trip to Branson at the last minute and got a great deal on a Villa. We could not have asked for a better place to stay. It was spacious and everything we needed was there, including laundry soap along with the washer and dryer. We really enjoyed the jacuzzi tub, fireplace and screened in patio, since it rained for 3 days straight. We still managed to keep the kids entertained with the Branson attractions and the activities available at the Westgate. They swam in the indoor pool and played Ping Pong and other games in the activity center. There were many people on the basketball courts, etc. between showers. I didn't even mind paying the $9.95 for internet service. You can avoid the strip from this location but it is only 5 minutes away. We would love to return some day.

Reviews.Title: “Gated Community with motel/cabins and condo's”
Reviews.Author: 182p
Reviews.Content: Clean comfortable and quite, nice place for Family or Couples. This place offers alot of activities like Basketball courts / ping pong tables / indoor and outdoor pools / 2 hottubs / and a list of activities for children. Our condo had a bathtub with jets in it but just good for 1 person at a time. I cannot tell about the cabins because they were full up and not available. .

Reviews.Title: “Be careful on what you sign.”
Reviews.Author: dougf74
Reviews.Content: We have stayed there now twice and bought a time share the last time. They keep on showing improvements but I have hesitation on when and if they will get things done. Room had a lamp shade that looked like someone sat on and broken handles in kitchen. This property (main building) was better then the old wood cabins that look liked they never had any remodeling done (we toured other units before we bought). We bought because we believe Westgate is better then other Branson area time share properties and we asked multiple times about maintenance and taxes and were told many times not to worry. We bought in September and in March we found out that our property and maintenance fee's are $661 (and due by April 1st) for a 2 bedroom every other year. Our mortgage payment for Westgate Branson Woods is about $200 a month and we never expected this. We currently have open complaints on this property and believe a retired couple would have difficulties with this steep fee! As a property, it is good and the improvements that they plan for the water slide/ water park should be great but I would suggest staying there and not buying there. Hints: after a certain time (I think 9 pm) their restaurant closes so I would plan ahead to stock the kitchen or order out. We (last fall) had to take a long trek to Taco Bell one night and really did noyt want to drive out that night.

Reviews.Title: “Retired Military”
Reviews.Author: Edward B
Reviews.Content: It was the first time staying at this resort since buying the timeshare. Very comfortable and clean. The staff was excellent and ver receptive to all of our requests and needs. Would highly recommend staying there.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: holmz
Reviews.Content: We traveled spur of the moment and booked online. They put us in one of the cabins (booked a "studio" room) and though it was small, everything we needed was there. Place was pretty empty the week after Christmas, so we had no hassles with overcrowding, etc. Wi-fi is not free ($10/day) but should be, and a 10 am checkout is a bit early. If we were ever to return to Branson, I'd consider staying here again. Nice property with a little nature walk and it's away from downtown hassles.

Reviews.Title: “Branson Woods Westgate”
Reviews.Author: Charlotte T
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a one bedroom Villa at Christmas 2011. The room was excellent, clean, and rustic. Had a little problem with the washer/dryer but other than that it was perfect for us. Very Convenient location. Very steep hill so if you probably could get iced in but very pretty. Most of Branson was steep anyway. One of The front desk could have been a little friendlier but Overall everything was Great. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Holiday vacation”
Reviews.Author: DebNRidgeville_Ohio
Reviews.Content: We are just finishing our vacation with our 3 grandchildren at Branson Woods. This resort has a great location. About 5 minutes from everything. We have a 2 bedroom villa. Great reviews on this resort. Very helpful staff.. Beds very comfortable....very clean when we arrived. Guest services has been very accommodating. Clubhouse area is great for the kids.. Branson came as a nice surprise to us, very kid friendly and great shows for the family. If you are looking for nice quiet well maintained and accommodations that are great,We highly recommend this resort

Reviews.Title: “lots of better place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Janis B
Reviews.Content: Our recent stay at Westgate Branson Woods was a big disappointment. There was a security guard at the gate, but things went down hill from there. It started out with a long wait to check in since there was only one person working the front desk. He was very efficient and polite, but one person can only do so much. The concierge was less than helpful---more like rude! The room was outdated and certainly not very clean. (Note that our room was a motel room; hopefully, the cabins would be better.) The shower was a disappointment, and the bed only adequate. At bed time we determined the beds only had a sheet and thin bedspread and there was only one blanket in the room (for two beds) but we were ready for bed and didn't want to call at that late hour. The extra blanket we requested for the second night was there when we returned late the next night, but it had a large hole in it. The morning's coffee was still in the coffee maker. The bed with made with the blanket used from the night before on TOP (looked quite unprofessional---yes, we wanted the blanket, but would have preferred for it to be UNDER the bed spread). When we tried to make notes from a phone call, there was a pen, but no note paper. For obvious reasons we decided to go elsewhere for our third night. We found a very clean room with a wonderful mattress. The price was much less, the service much better, the room MUCH cleaner, and included a great breakfast. I sent an email to the property on my return and have yet to get a response. There are LOTS of much better properties in Branson at a much better price.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this place at all costs!”
Reviews.Author: SSchaer
Reviews.Content: Do not stay here! We booked 2 condos a year in advance and then came for our vacation and found out the resort was overbooked. We were downgraded to two awful hotel rooms which was NOT the vacation experience we had come for. The customer service was horrendous and the manager was conveniently "never there." Also, our room was only cleaned ONCE in our 4 day stay! Do not stay at this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Rustic Beauty”
Reviews.Author: Jude546
Reviews.Content: The grounds are magnificent, decorated for Christmas now.The motel was more than adequate with all the amenities you'll ever need including frig, microwave, iron, hair dryer, and TV. There are nature trails , fountains, indoor pool and a large clubhouse with daily activities for everyone. Nice hot tub too! It's far enough from the craziness of "The Strip" but with access to all the theaters and restaurants in minutes with less traffic. Would stay there again in a heartbeat! Only negative I can possibly think of is that there was not FREE wi-fi.

Reviews.Title: “Girls shopping weekend”
Reviews.Author: AN636
Reviews.Content: Very nice staff. Breakfast was ok. For a place for a just girls shopping trip, it was ok....I do wish the pool was closer and easier accessible. They may have had an in door pool, but it wasn't a quick easy find, so we didn't look. It was close to shopping, so that was nice.

Reviews.Title: “Great trip!”
Reviews.Author: ddpayne1969
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights during my kids Fall Break. We were in building 1 & had a great stay. The walls were thin as are most walls though so nothing to big of a deal. The indoor pool was great for the girls to swim in, the location is great! I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Get Away”
Reviews.Author: Betty C
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival we were greeted at the gate by a very polite, helpful guard that directed us where to check in. Less than five minutes to complete registration and the gentlemen was nice and polite. Our Villa was clean, smelled good and fresh and everything worked. Stayed three nights and everything was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “The check in staff and lobby”
Reviews.Author: sophie m
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Woods, it was referred to me and my family by a friend-- The Lobby is beautiful-the whole property is beautiful- Upon check-in there was a small line and staff was busy no one even acknowledge the people waiting in line except one girl who worked there, which I found out when she checked us in was new. She was polite and so helpful but was needing information from her i assume boss. She tries to ask a question and was ignored as two employees had a conversation. She finally got the attention of her manager and he spoke to her in such a condescending tone - and she was perfectly in her rights to ask the question - she stated she was new and didn't know answer and didn't want to lie to us, so she would ask her boss so ewe would get correct answer and she would know answer-- so she asked, he acted as if she was bothering him, made me uncomfortable for asking, and then walked off to back and shut door. I saw a tear in her eye - it was very rude and she did not deserve it she was working very hard. ( she had only been there for couple of weeks). She had the most customer Service of anyone you have had there in a while except the older gentleman- he's also a gem!!!As for the other part of the crew a younger girl and young man and a guy i assume was the manager-- they could learn from the new girl-- customers come first and she gave us attention and i felt as if she cared if we enjoyed our vacation and almost like my family (have two boys) was her guest...The rooms were nice, we had to call for a light bulb and the maint. guy brought it rather quickly and was very nice. and pool area very attractive-- pizza was very good as well-- I loved my stay because of the two people, who seem to take pride in there job and the service they provide. I asked for information on a store i wanted to visit and she didn't know what store i was speaking of-- she said she would google it and see if she could find information for me-- i'd forgotten about it and later i received a call she had printed the info for me and it was at front desk, Way above and beyond----Keep these two and let them train the rest- during our sty they are the only two we saw at front desk and they always greeted us--- very well done when acquiring these two employees now find more like them... older gentleman Neil and lady- Annette or Lynette-- good job!!! great location close to everything but can avoid all traffic- i recommend a cabin versus motel type room -- well worth money.

Reviews.Title: “Wastgate Branson Mo”
Reviews.Author: newcastle2way
Reviews.Content: All of Westgate properties are top notch. They did buy other properties as well and they convert them into their floor plans and add Leather furniture and such. Always clean and tidy , rarely ever needing anything. Branson was very nice was located in one of their newest bldgs. their staff is very nice. Back in 2005 when I bought in Vegas the sales people were not that honest and had some problems. The remedied that situation and have had very good results. They have some new people that are going to make sure the new sales people abide by the rules so this company can shine once again. Timeshares can be a good investment if worked correctly.

Reviews.Title: “Housekeeping very poor”
Reviews.Author: Jopie84
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 6 days (Sept 14-20, 2011) in one of the hotel-type rooms. The room was not vaccuumed during all that time. We had to leave a note to have drinking cups each day. We made coffee one night and it was not cleaned up the next day. The breakfast left a lot to be desired. I have not had "Tang" since I was a child, and definitely did not want to have it now. No orange juice available. The scrambled eggs were brown looking. On top of all that, it cost $5.50 per person. Most other places offer a free breakfast, most of them "hot". I have stayed in many motels around the country and nowhere did I have to pay for internet hook-up. Westgate charges $9.99 for 24 hours here. Unbelievable. We stayed in a different place for the 7th day and had all we wanted. Although the grounds were beautiful, the room and service left a lot to be desired. Definitely will stay in a "different place" next time.

Reviews.Title: “Great week at great resort”
Reviews.Author: KTSunny
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Westgate Branson Woods for a week, September 3-10. Though we are owners here, we hadn’t been to Branson for several years, and had become kind of concerned about what was happening at the resort based on some of the comments recently made. Because I know that some people will complain no matter what, I took the bad reviews with a grain of salt determined to see for myself. I needn’t have worried! Branson Woods was better than ever! My husband and I drove down from Minnesota, about a 10 hour drive, and our daughter, son-in-law, and kids, ages 9, 6, and almost 5 drove up from Texas – just a bit short of a 10 hour drive. We arrived shortly after 4:00 p.m. and waited maybe 5 minutes in line to check in. The older gentleman that checked us in was friendly and efficient. We had reserved one of the loft style units with one bedroom and bath on the main floor and another bedroom and bath upstairs. Both bedrooms have King beds, and there is also a Queen sleeper sofa in the living room. The unit was spacious with plenty of room around the dining table to seat everyone. The kitchen is very well equipped, and has more cabinet space than many have at home. The downstairs bathroom is large with double sinks, large counter area and many cabinets and drawers. We first discovered that one of the sinks in the downstairs bathroom had a broken faucet controller. My husband, who always travels with tools, tried to repair it but realized that a new part was needed. When realizing that the one sink was inoperable, we tried the other sink and found the drain slow. They have a new motto about if you have a problem, call 1 2 3 4 and consider it done. They mean it! Within about ten minutes a maintenance man appeared and took care of the issues with both sinks! The next day we realized that part of the screening on the screened in porch had pulled out and that the canopy for the overhead light/fan on the porch was hanging down – not a functional issue, but not a good thing to have the wires exposed in case of storm with driving rain. We also found that the toaster in the kitchen didn’t work. We brought the one from the downstairs bedroom (which is actually a studio unit with microwave, small fridge, dishes, etc.) into the kitchen and it worked fine, but decided to report the non working one, so that the next person would have working appliances. We called 1 2 3 4 and within minutes a very friendly guy brought us a new toaster, still in the box and took away the one that didn’t work. Right after that a technician arrived and fixed the screen and the light. It turns out that you can call the same number for any need or question, whether you need to know something about the resort, or you need more toilet paper, towels, or shampoo. You not only get service, but friendly service with a smile! We were located not far from the Overlook Pool and the kids loved going there. During the week we also got up to the clubhouse and they swam in the large outdoor pool and the indoor pool. At one point though – both the Overlook Pool and the Main outdoor Pool were closed for cleaning as “someone had an accident”. I assume that there was a situation with a small child and not having them attired properly. I think it would be a good thing for Westgate to install a large sign saying “CHILDREN NOT POTTY TRAINED MUST WEAR SWIMMEES OR RUBBER PANTS TO PROTECT OTHERS”. The pools were cleaned and opened in a couple of days. Of course the reason you go to Branson is for the shows and entertainment and as always, we loved everything we saw. It was the first time there for our daughter and her family, and they didn’t know what to expect – they loved everything. We all attended the Hamner-Barber Show, Dixie Stampede, and the unbelievably fabulous Noah, the Musical. They also went to the Chinese Acrobats, the Legend of Kung Fu (the found it fantastic and also had the dinner served there and all loved it) and Silver Dollar City. We went to see George Dyer, who does morning shows at the Dutten Theater, man with an amazing voice after hearing him sing at the resort during the dinner Tuesday night. Noah is truly amazing, and there is a backstage tour that you can take, that requires only a reservation, no additional money. They use many live animals, and the animals all live down stairs in this huge building. Some of the animals used in the Ark are mechanical and others are costumed people, but there are live camels, horses, dogs, pigs, ducks, cattle, llamas, amazing Scottish cattle that look a lot like Water Buffalo (I love Water Buffalo!). It is truly an extravaganza performance and made even more interesting to get a glimpse backstage! I would recommend this show to everyone! Something that we found greatly improved since our last visit was the Tuesday evening dinner at the resort, where many performers from various shows come and give a sample of their talents. They have a new building with a stage and lots of chairs and long tables. It used to be held downstairs in the Clubhouse and space was limited. It was cheaper, but the food was nothing to brag about. The cost was $10 for adults, $6 for kids, and under 5 free. We made a point of getting there early enough to get at a table in the front so that the kids could easily see what was going on. Dinner was good and all you could eat and included, salad and fixings, potatoes, veggies, rolls, chicken, pulled pork, and assorted cobbler desserts. Unlimited coffee, iced tea and soft drinks were included. The entertainment included parts of maybe 12 different shows, and it was a very entertaining evening! Door prizes were given out and they had a certificate for a “Make a Bear” (one of their offered activities for kids) and my 4 year old granddaughter won it and loved the whole experience! Though they had many kids activities throughout the week, we were too busy with other things to participate in any of them. We found all the employees to be helpful and cheerful, the unit very well equipped and clean and the grounds beautifully landscaped and cared for. I am thinking that the people who did all the complaining must have paid to stay in one of the four buildings that have “motel like” units but expected to be housed in luxury villas for the same cost. Of course the scenery is beautiful, and resort conveniently located near to most everything!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome facility at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: DOS_54
Reviews.Content: Took the family for a quick 3 day vacation at Westgate over the summer and everybody had a great time. The resort is gated and is located right off Branson's main strip so the location was excellent. There were many great amenities like pool, basketball court, sand volleyball, etc. Plenty of stuff for the kids to run around in. We stayed in one of their one bedroom condos and I was very impressed with it. it was very spacious, clean and nicely furnished. It had a full kitchen so we were able to have some meals in the room to save some money. There were also all sorts of activities throughout the day for kids and adults alike. One bad thing is that there are not make options to eat inside the resort. There is a pizza place which was pretty good but that is about it; the breakfast was not that great. Overall it was a great stay and we would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “It was wonderful.”
Reviews.Author: Angie C
Reviews.Content: It was a nice, quiet resort that is perfect for a relaxing vacation. We had to get our key reprogrammed 2 or 3 times because it quit working. The staff was very accommodating each time we dealt with them.

Reviews.Title: “ok, but improvements needed”
Reviews.Author: graniclaus
Reviews.Content: Booked 3 2br villa's for 3 nights. Great rooms fully furnished but not totally clean, stained bedding and towels, dirty screen room and no maid service but did have enough towels to last. Confusion at check in and room keys were deleted twice?? No great deals on shows from hotel, hypnotist Jecobie was not worth the $$, very unprofessional in a dreary basement, dvd of show was 25.00 and was terrible filming. For the price I would book a family vac.here again despite the bad experiences.

Reviews.Title: “Super time share rental”
Reviews.Author: TravelingKim1963
Reviews.Content: This place was very comfortable. The setting was beautiful , with woods all around the cabins. The outdoor pool was great . I never made it to the indoor pool because of the beautiful weather. Location was great for the Liverpool Legend and Kirby the Magician show. Each of these shows I would recommend. We went August 13th -August 17 great time to visit. All local Missouri families go back to school and the crowds disappear! If you stay there check the activity center activities. There was entertainment scheduled some nights that you were not told about upon check in process. I would definitely come back.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing, unacceptable sleeping rooms, Transient conditions,Downgrade to 1-Star”
Reviews.Author: Doris M
Reviews.Content: Deceptive advertising on line and advertising from the Sales department. I booked my Family reunion here in August 2011, based on the advertisement from the sales department at Branson Woods. They contacted me from my request through the Bureau of Tourism in Branson. Everything was beautiful they met all our needs for a family reunion. The property upon arrival was beautiful, the check in desk was in a nice clean building surrounded by a beautiful landscape. That's where the nice ended. Upon arrival to my room I was totally disappointed; the room was a nightmare, It was like I made a wrong turn into a transient hotel. The room was dark and murky, the wall paper was peeling off the wall, the beds were half made with the pillow slips inside out, dingy linen and towels. The bathrooms were deplorable, there was a ring in the toilet and it smelled of urine. There was a bug crawling inside the windowsill. The room was on the backside of the building facing the woods. There were vacant rooms on the front side, that I was not allowed to move to When I asked to be move to a cleaner room. I was showed three different rooms on the backside of the building pretty much the same condition. The only reason I did not move to another hotel is because I had family members coming from 5 different states and I could not contact them at the last minute. The Group sales were not people friendly. After I signed the contract booking my group event, I was not able to talk to the Gp mananger again. My phone calls were not answered or returned. I was on my own when I arrived at the resort trying to find the banquet room that my group activities were scheduled for on Friday and Saturday night. I have been booking my family reunions for the last 15 years, this was my worst experience. Every other place the Group sales keep in contact with me plan and execute all my group needs. They personally meet me upon my arrival to make sure that all is well and that I have everything I need. The staff at Branson Woods, did not care how my stay was nor did they care if my group meeting rooms were acceptable. The room we had for Friday night Meet and Greet was good. However, the room we had on Saturday night was a night mare. We were promised a large glass enclosed room down by the pool. What we got was a Game room that was beihg used by the general public. The general public was constantly interrupting us, the room was not set-up nor was it clean. There were games on the table the carpet was stained. We had to clean up the room ourselves. There was no one from the resort staff to assist us. There was one person there, but he was there to rip up carpet and replace it. He was not aware of a function being held that night. This facility really need to be downgraded to 2 Stars or less. It definiately is not a 3-Star.

Reviews.Title: “Most likely not”
Reviews.Author: Jules R
Reviews.Content: The best part about our first EVER family vacation to Westgate Branson was the activities. Andrew A, Johnny Lonestar and Kenny M.made it fun for the kids, gave us great advice on shows, helped us get discounted tickets and made us laugh. Johnny recommended the Variety show so we could see the available shows for the weekend and I High-Five him. It was a great show with tons of entertainers! Our cabin, although roomy and convenient, was filthy. Even the dog's paws were black after only a few minutes of walking through. The washer/dryer combo was nice but it was hard to get past the floors!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay and relax...”
Reviews.Author: cocoandnoahtraveling
Reviews.Content: Vacationed for 1 week...beautiful view, staff was very kind. No problems every thing went smooth recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “An excellent location for family fun.”
Reviews.Author: irwin8401
Reviews.Content: We had a great time. Johnny Lonestar was great working with the kids during the activities. We will come back next year for sure

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: junk8401
Reviews.Content: activities onsite are great. Johnny Lonestar is awesome with my kids!

Reviews.Title: “We love our stay and will go back yearly .”
Reviews.Author: Pearce18
Reviews.Content: Rented room like a motel room first night . Then transfer to our Deluxe Villa the next morning . They didn't make us leave our room early that morning . Or didn't make us wait on our Deluxe Villa until check in time . We went straight over to our Villa when we got ready to that day and didn't have to be rushed or wait . They gave us a upgrade Villa free also the next day . It was so big and beautiful . The Villa was fully furnish with everything !! Kitchen had so many appliance . You wouldn't need to bring anything from home . The grounds of the Resort was so clean and pretty . They had something for every age to do at the Resort . They had a pizza restaurant . It was so fresh and delicious. It was free delivery . We went and played a little ping pong in the center. They had all kinds of stuff to do inside and out . Two big pools outside. And one outside pool had two big hot tubs beside it . Then one huge pool inside . They had so many pools and stuff to do that any of the pools were ever packed . And never seems crowed at the restore because it was so big . Love that about it . Will be back in the future .

Reviews.Title: “Activitie and pool!”
Reviews.Author: Guitarjess
Reviews.Content: Johnny was great in activities and helped my daughter and niece finish their suncatchers when they got frustrated. He also gave us great advice on shows and such. We also loved the outdoor pool but the indoor one was very cold. Towels were an issue but if you swam for a few hours you had one by the end. We had NO problems with our room or the AC!

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: AshibugRN
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently stayed in the 1 bedroom condo in the tower and we loved it! This was our second stay the last time we stayed in the condo suite that had a jacuzzi and it was amazing as well! The room was clean and quiet! The view from the balcony was amazing and the location being close to the mall and to the new Branson Landing was ideal! We didn't get to spend enough time here! We had plans for our trip but found ourselves lounging poolside or by the pool waterfall! Amazing place to stay I would recommend it to anyone and all ages!

Reviews.Title: “Nice accomodations, dirty floors”
Reviews.Author: aldlovetotravel
Reviews.Content: My parents own at this resort. Usually we don't have as many problems with the housekeeping, but we had to ask 4 times for them to clean the floor (which was probably not cleaned at all before we got there). I hope this doesn't mean things are going downhill! This was the first time we used the outdoor pool. It was very large & didn't seem crowded even though several people were there because of the warm temperatures! We took our PS2 & Wii to hook up in the room. It took a little work, but the guys were able to get it hooked up. There are ipod hook ups on the stereos. If you really don't have room, they have pack n plays & high chairs for infants. If we have the room, I will be taking mine next time. They weren't dirty, but definitely well used.

Reviews.Title: “The activity guys make the hotel”
Reviews.Author: ljmiranda23
Reviews.Content: The grounds were very beautiful with gorgeous pools and playgrounds but the hidden treasures were the "activity guys". Send your kids to do the activities. My daughter had so much fun with these guys that she actually asked if we HAD to go siteseeing because she didn't want to miss the activities.

Reviews.Title: “Can't believe people buy this as a timeshare!”
Reviews.Author: Elishapruett
Reviews.Content: Outside pool and play equipment was nice, but the room we stayed in was not. Floor left our feet black and had grout coming out of the tiles. Toilet didn't flush very well and had to use plunger most of the time. Lighting was bad. Had to have an outlet cover replaced. Fridge was broke when we arrived and was "reset" after calling, then went out again by the next day. Lost all of our food and when I tried to call about it there wasn't a supervisor or manager there at all. Said they would have someone call me back, but never did. When we decided to leave early because we had enough of the place I felt like I had been ripped off. Next time I will stay some where else. Also there was no free breakfast at this place. Had food catered in that cost extra. Maybe this is normal, but was new to me.

Reviews.Title: “Cabin Review”
Reviews.Author: S_FamilyFLA
Reviews.Content: Our experience with this facility was a good one...if you have to go to Branson. We didn't care for Missouri but, we found this facility to be fine. We stayed in Cabin 15, which was very clean. We had enough towels for our family of 4 & never had to call for restocking. Lots of pillows, kitchen supplies, etc. This cabin has a screened in porch (not all of them do) which was wonderful for early morning coffee breaks. The cabin was clean & newer then some of the others that our friends were staying in so, we felt lucky. It was convenient to the activities area but quiet even though on the main road. The only complaint we had was our daughter said the guest room mattress was uncomfortable. Our other daughter slept on the pull out couch and said that was fine. If we HAD to visit Branson again, we would stay here. If you don't already have your heart set on Branson though, we would recommend visiting the Smoky or Rocky Mountains instead- the Ozark's are just not that great.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty, bad customer service”
Reviews.Author: lucypuppat
Reviews.Content: When we got in our condo the first thing I noticed right away was that the dining room table was dirty. There was food all over it. The floors were real dirty. There were trash bags all around the units. It looked real trashy. The breakfast buffet area was real dirty. The tables we were suppose to eat on real dirty, they had not been wiped. The coffee was like syrup. It was awful. Unfortunately you have to pay before you have time to notice the tables are dirty and the coffee is unfit to drink. We have stayed here before. This place has gone way down. We called to say something was missing from the room. They said they would bring one to us. They never did. I complained to the front desk, they do not care.

Reviews.Title: “Gone down hill over time”
Reviews.Author: adh4589
Reviews.Content: Our family used to stay at this resort frequently and usually were pleased. This time however, was quite different. We stayed in two of the regular hotel rooms. Maintenance had to come when we first arrived to fix the curtains because they were barely hanging on the wall. Then in the other room we had to call housekeeping to come put new sheets on the beds. They had hair all over them and the bathroom had not been thoroughly cleaned either. The towels were dirty with hairs all over them as well. When brought to one of the managers attention, he was unremorseful and dismissed the issue. To top it off, they charge $10 to use their internet. Most places are free including the Radisson on the strip. We visit the area traditionally every year, sometimes twice. Come November we will find a new location.

Reviews.Title: “They need to truly consider the customer experience”
Reviews.Author: HPW5
Reviews.Content: Quite simpy: I wouldn't go back. The place looks lovely on the website and I found it far less relaxing than promised. We had to constantly call for towels since only two were left for a family of five. There are activities on the property - volley ball, basketball, shuffleboard, etc.... but there is absolutely no lightning around these activities or the seperate buildings. So once it went dark, you couldn't see a thing! We had to grope our way around the buildings and actually tripped down the three steps from the road near the pool to try and get to building 7. There were no lights outside of the building or inside of the stairwell as we tried to carry up our luggage at 10 at night. One of the hot tubs heat didn't work so everyone was trying to use the one that did work. And just when I think we can finally relax, the bed was hard as a rock! And why should I pay for internet service when a Super 8 has it for free and their rooms were cheaper too?!

Reviews.Title: “the activities team at westgate branson woods resort”
Reviews.Author: OklahomaCityFlygirl
Reviews.Content: we stayed at the westgate branson woods and took our kids to the activities. the activity team was great with my kids (3 and 5). there was plenty for them to do and johnny lonestar and andrew alton ( activities) were so helpful with must see attractions in branson as well as things to do at the resort. we had a wonderful time. jana from oklahoma

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and we will return.”
Reviews.Author: bcseafaris
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with the 1 bedroom cabin. It was a little dated as far as the furniture goes, but more than acceptable. It was private and not noisey even though it was on the main entrance road.

Reviews.Title: “A Cozy Port in a Storm”
Reviews.Author: DrMike83158
Reviews.Content: My wife and I vacationed in a two bedroom cabin at Westgate Branson Woods resort the week that the devastating tornado tore through nearby Joplin, Missouri. Despite the fact that the weather was nasty due to storms associated with that weather system and others in the days we were there, we had a wonderful time in a cozy, well-equipped cabin. We had secured the cabin in a silent auction and we were, frankly, quite apprehensive as we arrived for our stay. In the weeks leading up to the trip, as we sought to finalize our arrangements, we had encountered a number of headaches caused by confusion on the part of the resort management.
